Text.Page:
You have found the lair of the Dragon Lords, a secretive group that existed in Arborea for years.
Since you've already ventured this deep into the Fortress, talk to me and my collegues here, as we're all impart some knowledge onto thee.My collegues have want to share their knowledge about specific dragon breeds, while my inclination is with their magical properties;
- Collect all 5 Mythical Mounts to get the Title Mythical Dragon Hunter- Collect all 5 Fabled Mounts to get the Title Fabled Dragon Lord- Collect all 5 Legendary Mounts to get the Title Legendary Dragon Master- Collect all 5 Almighty Mounts to get the Title Almighty Dragon Sovereign- Collect all 25 dragons to get the Title Dragon Lord
